name: ShootShift
description:
ShootShift is the game which let you play a thing that shapeshift in to other things every five actions you take. Oh, and enemies shapeshifts too.

In the game there are two floors divided in rooms filled with enemies. There is one item room and one boss room in each floor.

///Controls

WASD to move

ARROWS to shoot (NB: some weapons are fixed and some are mobile and let you shoot in the direction you want)

R or SPACE to reload

TAB minimap

H toggle Hardcore mode (You can switch mode only in the menu)

///Stuff I used to make it

-GameMaker:Studio for coding

-GraphicsGale for pixelarting

-Gimp for fine details

-Bfxr for sfx

NB: in the game there is no music, only sfx.
